long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wallpapers

Download our amazing image New Tab Wallpaper extension, created specifically for fans of cool Wallpapers!

Just open a new tab and each new tab will:
- Show beautiful images in new tab home screen wallpapers
- Provide the best search results by changing your search engine on the new tab to Google
- Easy to view time of day
- Random affirmations

By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to installing the Wallpapers Chrome extension and setting Chrome as your default browser.
